data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Because CPAN doc did not make much glue how to name module which
    provides interface to other sofware and I did not find similar
    non-root module in database I had to choose root namespace,
    suggestion welcome. BinRPC is proprietary version of RPC working
    over TCP/UDP/Unix socket, and is introduced by SER(Sip Express
    Router) to control running Ser.
